sections.text: under act; use.Funding under the Rural Behavioral Health Training and Placement Program Act shall support:(1) Faculty clinical training activities;(2) Internship stipends for behavioral health interns and postdoctoral fellows; and(3) Training and service provision expenses, including, but not limited to, travel to rural clinic sites, equipment, clinic space, patient-record management, scheduling, and telehealth supervision.SourceLaws 2006, LB 994, ยง 41.

71-5683.Funding under act; use.

Funding under the Rural Behavioral Health Training and Placement Program Act shall support:

(1) Faculty clinical training activities;

(2) Internship stipends for behavioral health interns and postdoctoral fellows; and

(3) Training and service provision expenses, including, but not limited to, travel to rural clinic sites, equipment, clinic space, patient-record management, scheduling, and telehealth supervision.

SourceLaws 2006, LB 994, ยง 41.
